name: Pro Skater XXL [Gain Jam 2022][v0.1]
description:
This is a skateboarding game where the goal is to become the most popular professional skater! You may be tempted to take shortcuts to the top!

CONTENT WARNING: Game contains furry weight gain

The game stars Mac! A chunky polar bear lady who loves to snack

Should work with both keyboard and gamepad.

Game has been in development for about 8 days for weightgaming forum gain jam!
